page.title: 18CHURCHES AND CHAPELS
page.content:
{ CHURCHES: { Garvestone (Norman) { Whinburgh (Norman) { Reymeston (Norman) { Thuxton (Saxon+Norman) { CHAPELS: { Whinburgh (Closed) { Garvestone (Open)
The name of the Whinburgh church which has just been re-opened is St Mary's.The name of the church at Garvestone is St Margaret's. They are in a group of 15 churches called the Barnham Broom Group.On average 5 people normally go to a morning service.About 25 people usually go to an evening service.
The rector is the Reverend Peter Stephens.
